title: Font Editors
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20140701065158/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Software](http://web.archive.org/web/20140701065158/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Software) : Font Editors**

[AsiaFont Studio](http://web.archive.org/web/20140701065158/http:/typophile.com/wiki/AsiaFont%20Studio)  
 [Birdfont](http://web.archive.org/web/20140701065158/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Birdfont)

 [DoubleType](http://web.archive.org/web/20140701065158/http:/typophile.com/wiki/DoubleType)

 [Glyphs](http://web.archive.org/web/20140701065158/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Glyphs)  
 [Ikarus](http://web.archive.org/web/20140701065158/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Ikarus)

Need help choosing the right font editor for you? See [FAQ software](http://web.archive.org/web/20140701065158/http:/typophile.com/wiki/FAQ%20software).
author: Rodrigue Planck
